objectives: Learn core sports/game vocabulary (TEAM, PRACTICE, WIN/LOSE, SCORE, GAME)

vocab.def: Two C-hands join at thumb; shows group identity.
A-hand rubs against index finger repeatedly.
WIN: S-hand lands into flat palm; LOSE: L-hand drops onto palm.
Index fingers tap forward, showing tally or points.
GAME: A-hands bump; PLAY: Y-hands wiggle outward.
A-hands alternate movement side to side.
Preferences with compact motion + clear NMM.
